headline: Is Corpay (CPAY) Pricing Reflect Long Term Returns After Recent Share Price Strength
summary: If you are wondering whether Corpay at around US$342.51 is giving you fair value for the risk you take, you are asking the right question before making any decision. The stock is up 6.8% over the last 30 days and 13.9% year to date, but that sits alongside a 1 year return of 11.4% and a 3 year return of 63.3%. This can change how the current price feels to existing and potential shareholders. Recent coverage has focused on Corpay's position in diversified financials and on how investors are...
